arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou message to media about key player echoes Celtic title race days
arts.sum: Former Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou continues to pay little attention to external perceptions

arts.ttl: The reason Luke McCowan and Arne Engels were benched for Celtic's win at Aberdeen
arts.sum: Reo Hatate’s goal sealed Celtic’s Pittodrie win as Rodgers made four changes from the team that hammered Ross County at Celtic Park . Brendan Rodgers explains Celtic team changes vs Aberdeen

arts.ttl: Watch the best of Celtic's gritty win at Pittodrie
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Celtic edge out Aberdeen to move seven points clear at the top of the Scottish Premiership. (UK only)

arts.ttl: 'Nobody is catching domestic machine Celtic now'
arts.sum: Celtic's lead looks insurmountable after they grind out victory over dogged Aberdeen at rain-lashed Pittdorie to go seven points clear, writes Tom English.

arts.ttl: Sutton hails ‘enormous' win for Celtic in 'wild conditions’ at Pittodrie
arts.sum: Chris Sutton has lauded Celtic for grinding out an “enormous” win over Aberdeen to tighten their grip on the Scottish Premiership title.

arts.ttl: Celtic Alex Valle recall fear as Barcelona injury consequence looms large
arts.sum: A nasty injury to Barcelona defender Alejandro Balde sparked fears that Alex Valle will be recalled from his Celtic loan.

arts.ttl: Daniel Cummings Celtic state of play as possible transfer compensation 'outlined'
arts.sum: Celtic starlet Daniel Cummings has reportedly not yet been offered a new contract with Premier League clubs linked with a transfer swoop.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers shuts down Celtic title race poser as Scottish Premiership lead grows
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers has insisted the title race is "nowhere near done" despite a significant lead over both Aberdeen and Rangers.

arts.ttl: Cameron Carter-Vickers sees pundits wax lyrical over Celtic performance as Hoops lauded for 'fighting spirit'
arts.sum: Cameron Carter-Vickers' vital block to keep Celtic in the lead against Aberdeen left pundits in awe of his talents, as the Hoops make their way down from Pittodrie with a 1-0 win under their belt - with the defender having denied Ester Sokler from scoring a late equaliser. The win puts Celtic seven points clear with a game in hand, and it has seen Carter-Vickers praised for his commitment - with Jonny Hayes stating that the defender's 'fighting spirit' filters through to the whole team and makes them impenetrable.

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers champions Celtic diehards hit with Pittodrie punishment as Thelin bigs up mystery man who sickened him
arts.sum: Three points was the reward for the hardy Hoops in the exposed Aberdeen corner and Rodgers made sure to pay tribute
